channel.title: Identity on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Identity on Konigi

item.title: MTV's brand new look
item.description: MTV International / Mad Drummer from Universal Everything on Vimeo. Awesome motion graphics by Universal Everything for MTV. Creative Review reviews the new work on MTV’s new look, which is a forward-looking transformation that reminds me feel that reminds me of Cartoon Network’s recent rebranding in the Tristan Eaton designed character videos. http://creativereview.co.uk/cr-blog/2009/june/mtvs-brand-new-look

item.title: A Guide to Choosing Colors for Your Brand
item.description: Usability Post combines the color values from Cymbolism with popular brands to demonstrate the association of color with meaning. http://www.usabilitypost.com/2008/09/29/a-guide-to-choosing-colors-for-your-brand/
